Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;silicon^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 鼓励。请多多尝试各种材料，如木材、泥土、石头等多种材料，你会发现几乎什么东西都可以提取。
Texts.Eng: Encouraging. Try the same thing with other materials such as wood, dirt, stone...heck, almost anything really. You'll find all sorts of things if you just give it a try!

Texts.Chs: 教学。现在你想必已经有了一个^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，那么你就可以尝试把各种材料放进去了，请把放入至少^green;50份的沙^reset;，然后从中提取出^orange;硅^reset;，并把它带给我。
Texts.Eng: Instructive. Now that you have an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; you can start cutting your teeth on all sorts of new creations. Try getting at least 50 ^green;sand^reset; and extracting from it to get ^orange;silicon^reset;.
